trans-unit.source: Specifies drill-down and node viewing mode for an <xref:system.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner>, such as Flowcharts, that are used to compose activities.
trans-unit.target: Anger nedåt och noden visningsläge för en <xref:system.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner>, till exempel flödesscheman, som används för att skapa aktiviteter.</xref:system.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Drilling down into the UI elements is allowed by default.
trans-unit.target: Gå nedåt i UI-element tillåts som standard.

trans-unit.source: It can be disallowed by setting the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AllowDrillIn%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Kan inte tillåts genom att ange den <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AllowDrillIn%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AllowDrillIn%2A>

trans-unit.source: Child nodes are not always collapsed by default, but can be set to always collapse by setting the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AlwaysCollapseChildren%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Underordnade noder inte alltid döljs som standard, men kan ställas in att komprimera alltid genom att ange den <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AlwaysCollapseChildren%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AlwaysCollapseChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute*> class.

The default values assigned by this constructor are `true` for the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AllowDrillIn%2A> property and `false` for the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AlwaysCollapseChildren%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdena som tilldelats av den här konstruktorn är `true` för den <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AllowDrillIn%2A>egenskapen och `false` för den <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AlwaysCollapseChildren%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AlwaysCollapseChildren%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AllowDrillIn%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether drilling down one level into an <xref:system.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner> is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om gå ned en nivå i en <xref:system.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner>tillåts.</xref:system.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if drilling into the UI elements is allowed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om vidaresökning i UI-element tillåts; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the child nodes are always collapsed.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om de underordnade noderna alltid är dolda.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the child nodes are always collapsed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om de underordnade noderna är alltid dolda; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the function of outline view icon provider.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger funktionen disposition visa ikonen providern.

trans-unit.source: The function of outline view icon provider.
